item.title: Graphical linux desktop using NoMachine NX
item.description:
Updated advice Nov 2024, now works for all platforms if you update your SSH key.

Introduction  

  • This service provides a graphical Linux desktop on JASMIN, ideal for use with graphics-heavy tasks like interactive work with large images.
  • The desktop environment includes a Firefox web browser which can be used to access internal-only web resources.

Using graphical applications over a wide-area network can be very slow, and is not recommended or supported on JASMIN. This service provides a better alternative with graphical desktop within the JASMIN environment itself, rather than on the user’s local machine.
